findings.title: Improved Validation Of Function Arguments
findings.description: In the `Coin98Multisig` contract, there is a public function `changeOwners()` that is designed to add/remove/change owners, with their respective voting weight.

findings.title: Potential Reentrancy Risk in Coin98Multisig::vote()
findings.description: Violation of checks-effects-interactions principle in Coin98Multisig's vote() function, potentially leading to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Redundant State/Code Removal
findings.description: In the `Coin98Multisig` contract, there are unused code or unnecessary redundancies that can be safely removed.
